menus.data_access package

Submodules

menus.data_access.CrudInterface module

CRUD Interface Module

This module defines the CRUD interface for data access operations.

Dependencies:

  • sqlite3: Standard SQLite3 database interface module.

  • typing: Support for type hints.

class menus.data_access.CrudInterface.CrudInterface(data_access: Connection)[source]

Bases: object

Interface for CRUD operations on database tables.

Attributes:

data_access (sqlite3.Connection): Connection to the SQLite database.

create(object_instance: object)[source]

Creates a new object in the database.

Args:

object_instance (object): The object instance to create.

data_access: Connection
delete(object_id: int)[source]

Deletes an object from the database.

Args:

object_id (int): The ID of the object to delete.

is_object_exist(object_id: int, table: Literal['MENU']) → bool[source]

Checks if an object with the given ID exists in the specified table.

Args:

object_id (int): The ID of the object to check. table (Literal[“MENU”]): The table to check for object existence.

Returns:

bool: True if the object exists, False otherwise.

Raises:

ValueError: If the table name is not allowed.

read(object_id: int)[source]

Reads an object from the database.

Args:

object_id (int): The ID of the object to read.

update(object_id: int, object_instance: object)[source]

Updates an object in the database.

Args:

object_id (int): The ID of the object to update. object_instance (object): The updated object instance.

menus.data_access.Data module

menus.data_access.Singleton module

Singleton Metaclass Module

This module defines a Singleton metaclass used for implementing the singleton design pattern.

class menus.data_access.Singleton.Singleton[source]

Bases: type

Metaclass implementing the singleton design pattern.

This metaclass ensures that only one instance of a class is created.

Attributes:

_instances (dict): Dictionary storing instances of classes.
